feedback:
Limited DRIVER framework demonstration. Focus on these missing stages: I, R2, E, V, R.


AREAS FOR IMPROVEMENT:
- Financial APP: The submission contains only a single remark about YouTube captions and no discussion, design, or demonstration of any financial functionality. With only the Discover-stage note and no financial content or tasks performed, the criterion that the tool functions as a financial application is not met.
- Integrate AI: The submission contains only a brief discovery observation and no demonstration of integrating AI capabilities or adding value (no proposed AI solution, implementation, or discussion), so it fails the criterion.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
criteria.driver_alignment: - DISCOVER: The only documented DRIVER stage is Discover, with a note about YouTube captions; there is no evidence of later stages (Define, Ideate, Validate, Release) or any financial-app development or functionality.
criteria.reasoning: The submission contains only a single remark about YouTube captions and no discussion, design, or demonstration of any financial functionality. With only the Discover-stage note and no financial content or tasks performed, the criterion that the tool functions as a financial application is not met.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover stage: the student only noted a problem ("YouTube didn't auto generate captions"); there is no evidence of Define, Develop, or Deploy stages showing AI integration or solutions.
criteria.reasoning: The submission contains only a brief discovery observation and no demonstration of integrating AI capabilities or adding value (no proposed AI solution, implementation, or discussion), so it fails the criterion.
